fileSamples.statement: (P : actid -> Prop) : forall e : actid, E e -> ~ P e -> exists e' : actid, sb^? e' e /\ next G P e'.
fileSamples.conclusion: forall e : actid, E e -> ~ P e -> exists e' : actid, sb^? e' e /\ next G P e'
fileSamples.hypotheses: (P : actid -> Prop)
fileSamples.proofString:
set (Q e := E e -> ~ P e ->                exists e' : actid, sb^? e' e /\ next G P e').
apply (@well_founded_ind _ sb (wf_sb G) Q).
ins; subst Q; simpls.
destruct (classic (exists e', sb e' x /\ ~ P e')) as        [[e' [H' COV]]| H']; ins.
assert (E e') as ACTS.
apply seq_eqv_l in H'; desf.
specialize (H e' H' ACTS COV).
destruct H as [z [X Y]].
exists z; split; auto.
right.
red in X; desf.
eapply sb_trans; eauto.
exists x; splits; [by left|]; red; splits; auto.
unfolder; splits; eauto.
unfold dom_cond; unfolder.
ins; desc; subst.
destruct (classic (P x0)); auto.
exfalso; apply H'; vauto.
